definition: a joint of a finger when the fist is closed, to shoot a marble while keeping one's knuckles on the ground
details:
noun
- a joint of a finger when the fist is closed
= example: a joint of a finger when the fist is closed
= synonyms: knuckle joint
verb
- to shoot a marble while keeping one's knuckles on the ground
= example: to shoot a marble while keeping one's knuckles on the ground
- to press or rub with the knuckles
= example: to press or rub with the knuckles
